nodes.text: Aleemas were a brand of laced running shoes named after the famous shockball player Ytavarg Aleema. Shockboxer Lobar Aybock used Aleemas in his traditional run prior to shockboxing matches during the early years of the New Republic.
Aleemas first appeared in Fists of Ion, a 2008 article written for Hyperspace by Edward M. Erdelac. Erdelac's blog on StarWars.com confirmed that Aleemas were named after Ytavarg Aleema.
